name: WMP Eurocom AG
memberOrga: WMP EUrocom AG | WMP Finanzkommunikation GmbH | WMP Healthcare GmbH | GPA German Public Affairs GmbH |
goal: WMP EuroCom is one of Germany´s leading independent communication consultancies. It serves as advisor and facilitator in the field of government relations and as partner for companies and organizations in the representation of their interests towards the public sector. Our consultants advise companies, organizations and national governments on the growing complexity of the EU decision-making structure and legislative procedures.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Landwirtschaft, insbesondere die Reform der GAP
Wirtschaft- und Währung, Finanzpolitik
Handelspolitik
Datenschutz
Europäische Außenpolitik
